how_it_works:
1. Submit claim via POST request with x402 payment header
2. AI Prover searches web and builds supporting arguments
3. AI Debunker searches web and builds counter-arguments
4. AI Judge evaluates both sides and issues verdict with confidence score
5. Receive JSON/HTML/Text response with full reasoning and sources
